Detailed Description

Manage translations.

Use the start method to start the Manager, after starting the cache manager Ubiquity$TranslatorManager This class is part of Ubiquity

Author
jcheron myadd.nosp@m.ress.nosp@m.mail@.nosp@m.gmai.nosp@m.l.com
Version
1.0.5

◆ start()

static start (   $locale = 'en_EN',
  $fallbackLocale = null,
  $rootDir = null 
)
static

Starts the translator manager.

This operation must be performed after the CacheManager has been started

Parameters
string$localeThe active locale
string$fallbackLocaleThe fallback locale
string$rootDirThe root dir for translation (default: appRoot/translations)
